text: ZOOM: Join Green governor candidate Dan Kapelovitz @kapelovitz4gov (in the Sept 14 California Recall election) to hear about his campaign & ask questions, Sun, Aug 1@ 1pm, pre-register here https://t.co/vXCQ0Cshqu #CArecall #CApolitics #CAelections #GreenParty @gpca @GreenPartyUS https://t.co/ZOpdaaUHAx
